title: Customer Service Practical Competency Enhancement: Workplace Learning Information Literacy Capacity-Building Program

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental digital information literacy and possession of job-related professional knowledge
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Identify diverse information sources (digital, physical, social) and effectively utilize them for job-related problem-solving
Establish decision-making strategies linked to professional identity during information evaluation and analysis processes

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
